sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-card v-if="chartData != null" >
      <AABarChart
        :chartData="chartData"
        :options="chartOptions"
        :height="200"
        ref="AABarChart"
        :key="AAKey"
      >
    </AABarChart>

  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import AABarChart from "@/components/AABarChart.vue";
// import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";

export default {
  name: "InvestmentAAChartSummary",
  // inject: ["scenarioId"],
  props: {
    RPAANames: {
      type: Array,
      required: false
    },
    AASummary: {
      type: Array,
      required: false
    },
    amount: {
      type: Number,
      required: true
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      AAKey:0,
      chartOptions: {
        scales: {
            yAxes: [{
                ticks: {
                    beginAtZero: true,
                    maxTicksLimit: 6,
                    callback: function (value) {
                      return value.toLocaleString('en-US', {style:'percent'});
                    }
                }
            }],
            xAxes: [{
                ticks: {
                  maxRotation: 0 // angle in degrees
                }
            }],
        },
        title: {
          display: true,
          text: "Asset Allocation",
        },
        legend: {
          display: false,
        },
      }
    };
  },
  components: {
    AABarChart
  },
  computed: {
    nameSet: function (){
      let AANameList = {};
      let checkList = [];
      for (let i = 0; i < this.RPAANames.length; i++) {
        let found = false;
        let aaName = this.RPAANames[i];
          if (checkList.includes(aaName.custom_name)) {
            found = true;
          }
          if (!found) {
            // THE SPACE ADDED BELOW ALLOWS THE OBJECT TO RETAIN
            // ORDERING OF ITS INTEGER PROPERTIES. THE VUE CONSOLE REMOVES THIS
            // SPACE BUT BROWSER READS IT CORRECTLY.
            AANameList[' '+aaName.id] = aaName.custom_name;
            found = false;
            checkList.push(aaName.custom_name);
          }
      }
      return (AANameList)
    },
    propAASummary(){
      return this.AASummary
    },
    AAArray() {
      if (this.AASummary != null) {
        let result = [];
          for (let key in this.nameSet) {
            let found = false;
            const keyTrimmed = Number(key.trim())
            // console.log(this.AASummary);


            for (let i=0; i < this.AASummary.length; i++) {
              if (Object.keys(this.AASummary[i].name).length > 0) {
                let rp1 = this.AASummary[i].name.rp_aaname_link;
                if (rp1.includes(keyTrimmed)) {
                  result.push(Number(this.AASummary[i].percentage));
                  found = true;
                  break
                }
              } else if (this.AASummary[i].rp_name_id != null) {
                let rp2 = this.AASummary[i].rp_name_id;
                if (rp2 == keyTrimmed) {
                  result.push(Number(this.AASummary[i].percentage));
                  found = true;
                  break
                }
              }
            }
            if (!found) {
              result.push(0);
            }
          }
        return result;
      } else {
        return [];
      }
    },
    chartData(){
      return {
        labels: Object.values(this.nameSet),
        datasets: [
          {
            data: this.AAArray,
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)',
            borderColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)',
            borderWidth: 1,
            label: "Asset Allocation"
          },
        ]
      }
    },
  },
  watch: {
    AASummary () {
      this.forceRerender();
    },
  },
  methods: {
    forceRerender(){
      this.AAKey += 1;
    },
    // getAASummary() {
    //   for (let i=0; i < this.currentPlatforms.length; i++) {
    //     let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.currentPlatforms[i].id}/aasummary/`;
    //     apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
    //       this.currentAASummary = data.results;
    //     });
    //   }
    // },
    // getRPAANameData() {
    //   let endpoint = `/api/activeriskprofilenames/`;
    //   apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
    //     this.RPAANames = data.results;
    //   });
    // },
  },
  mounted() {
    // this.getRPAANameData();
    // this.getAASummary();
  }
};
</script>
